General.Name: JiShi Media Co Ltd
General.Description: JiShi Media Co., Ltd. engages in the planning, construction, and operation management of the cable digital TV intelligent optical network in China. The company offers radio and television viewing services, and digital TV value-added services comprising high-definition and ultra-high-definition digital TV program live broadcast, video on demand, data broadcast expansion, and various Internet platform applications for radio and television users and other value-added business services; cable television network access engineering supporting services; and in-network landing transmission services for TV program suppliers, as well as receives and transmits cable TV program signals to users through the network. It also provides broadband internet service based on digital TV network; intelligent terminal products; cloud computing and big data application services; local and remote private line networks for government and enterprise customers; and social information application services, including data storage, big data computing, platform construction, and related application services. JiShi Media Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Changchun, China.
General.Address: Jishi Media Information Hub Center, Changchun, China, 130021
